naslov: Diklo - idealna investicija za najam 8 stambenih jedinica! 849000€ (prodaja)
opis: Zadar - Diklo Rezidencijalna zona grada. Apartmanska kuća s 8 stambenih jedinica idealna za turistički, kao i za cjelogodišnji najam. Površina objekta iznosi 404m2, a sagrađen je na zemljištu površine 780m2. S gornjih katova pruža se pogled na more. Suteren: - studio apartman, - kotlovnica. Prizemlje: - dvosoban apartman. Prvi kat: - studio apartman, - dva dvosobna stana. Drugi kat: - studio apartman, - dva dvosobna stana. Parkirna mjesta nalaze se u dvorištu kuće. Kotlovnica za grijanje i hlađenje. Solarne ploče. Agencijska naknada sukladno Općim uvjetima poslovanja. Cjelokupni kupoprodajni proces vođen od strane našeg ovlaštenog Odvjetničkog tima. OBILAZAK NEKRETNINE OSIGURAN 7/7 DANA PO PRETHODNOM DOGOVORU! Zadar - Diklo Residential zone of the city. Apartment house with 8 residential units ideal for tourist, as well as a year-round rent. The area of ​​the building is 404m2 and it was built on a plot of land of 780m2. From the upper floors there is a view of the sea. Basement: - studio apartment, - boiler room. Ground floor: - two-bedroom apartment. First floor: - studio apartment, - 2 two-bedroom apartments. Second floor: - studio apartment, - 2 two-bedroom apartments. Parking spaces are located in the yard of the house. Boiler room for heating and cooling. Solar panels. Brokerage fee in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions. The entire purchase/sale process is managed by our authorized law office. TOUR OF THE PROPERTY INSURED 7/7 DAYS BY PRIOR ARRANGEMENT! Zadar - Diklo Wohngebiet der Stadt. Apartmenthaus mit 8 Wohneinheiten ideal für Touristen, sowie eine Ganzjahresmiete. Die Fläche des Gebäudes beträgt 404 m2 und es wurde auf einem Grundstück von 780 m2 gebaut. Von den oberen Etagen hat man einen Meerblick. Keller: - Atelierwohnung, - Heizungsraum. Erdgeschoss: - Wohnung mit zwei Schlafzimmern.
